name: APEX Racing
description:
-Online multiplayer
-Time attack
-Drift challenges
-Global leaderboards
-Real world tracks and roads(Ebisu Minami, Angeles Crest Highway, etc.)
-Customizable body parts with aerodynamic influence
-Vehicle suspension and performance tuning
-Online chat system


Notes:

- iPhone 5s or newer is required to play.
- A network connection is required to play.
- Apex Racing is free to play. In game credits can be purchased using real money via in-app purchases
- Zero pop-up ads.

Stay tuned on our social media!

INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/apex_games.co/
